010package imagingbook.pub.threshold.global;
011
012public class QuantileThresholder extends GlobalThresholder {
013        
014        private double b = 0.5; // quantile of expected background pixels
015
016        public QuantileThresholder() {
017                super();
018        }
019        
020        public QuantileThresholder(double b) {
021                super();
022                this.b = b;
023        }
024
025        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
026                int K = h.length;
027                int N = sum(h);
028                
029                double n = N * b;       
030                int i = 0;
031                int c = h[0];
032                while (i < K && c < n) {
033                        i++;
034                        c+= h[i];
035                }
036                
037                int q = (c < N) ? i : -1; 
038                return q;
039        }
040}
